textBeforeTable: Top Fly Products Race: The 2006 version of the FLY Products Power Race paramotor is the perfect balance between weight, power and portability. Paramotor suitable for pilot weight from 130 lbs. to 200 lbs. Vittorazi Fly 100 Evo engine of 18 HP 100 cc. Available in two versions: Race Light (manual starter with gear drive centrifugal clutch) and Race Deluxe (manual and electric starter with gear drive centrifugal clutch – extra $250), intake carburetor silencer, chromed tune pipe exhaust with an extra muffler (silencer), wooden propeller, fully dismountable frame (2 pieces) and cage (6 pieces) for easy and compact transportation inside a FLY Products hard suitcase. Price does not include the hard suitcase ($480).   It is the ideal paramotor for the light to medium weight PPG pilot (recommended for pilots up to 200 lbs.). The Vittorazi Fly 100 Evo is the most reliable and powerful 100 cc. engine of the market today. Bullet-proof gear drive centrifugal clutch and its fully dismountable cage and main frame (same as Kompress) make things easy when transporting the unit inside a hard suitcase (optional) to places outside your local flying field The engine is cooled by a turbine fitted between the cylinder and head. textAfterTable: Top Fly Products Max: Paramotor suitable for pilot weight from 130 lbs. to 440 lbs. BEST SELLER IN 2008. FLY Products did it again!
